title: AI-Powered Resume Parser & Job Matcher
shortDescription: Intelligent resume parsing platform that extracts structured data and matches candidates with perfect job opportunities
fullDescription: Build a sophisticated resume parsing platform that uses NLP to extract skills, experience, education, and achievements from resumes in any format. Implements advanced entity recognition, skill gap analysis, and semantic job matching. Features real-time resume feedback, ATS compatibility scoring, and personalized career path recommendations. Includes bulk processing API for recruitment agencies and integration with major job boards.
architecture: Next.js frontend with server components, Python FastAPI microservices, pgvector for semantic search, Celery for async resume processing, Redis for caching, and Elasticsearch for job matching

title: AI Legal Document Automation Platform
shortDescription: Automated legal document generation and contract analysis with AI
fullDescription: Create a platform that revolutionizes legal document creation using AI. Features intelligent contract generation from plain English descriptions, automated redlining, and compliance checking. Implements clause extraction, risk identification, and negotiation suggestion engine. Includes electronic signatures, version control, and collaboration features for legal teams. Reduces document preparation time from hours to minutes.

timeline.title: Schema Design
timeline.description: Document data model and clause database

title: Crowdsourced Hyperlocal Traffic Platform
shortDescription: Community-driven real-time traffic intelligence platform
fullDescription: Develop a hyperlocal traffic intelligence platform that leverages crowdsourced data from commuters. Features real-time incident reporting, predictive traffic forecasting, and alternative route optimization. Implements gamification for user engagement, anonymous location tracking, and integration with municipal traffic systems. Includes heat maps, commute time predictions, and public transit integration.

title: Elderly Care Coordination Platform
shortDescription: Comprehensive platform connecting elderly individuals with caregivers and family members
fullDescription: Build a holistic elderly care coordination platform that connects seniors, family members, and professional caregivers. Features medication reminders with IoT integration, fall detection alerts, telemedicine consultations, and daily activity logging. Implements AI-based anomaly detection for unusual behavior patterns. Includes family dashboard, caregiver scheduling, and emergency response system.

title: Sustainable Fashion Marketplace
shortDescription: Circular economy platform for buying, selling, and upcycling sustainable fashion
fullDescription: Create a marketplace dedicated to sustainable fashion with features for selling second-hand clothes, renting designer items, and discovering upcycled fashion. Implements AI-powered clothing condition assessment, size recommendation engine, and virtual try-on using AR. Includes carbon footprint tracking for each item, sustainable brand verification, and clothing care instructions. Features community styling tips and fashion challenges.

title: Freelancer Collaboration & Revenue Sharing Hub
shortDescription: Platform enabling freelancers to form teams and collaborate on projects with automated revenue sharing
fullDescription: Build a platform that revolutionizes how freelancers collaborate by enabling them to form temporary teams for large projects. Features intelligent team formation based on skills, automated revenue sharing with smart contracts, and project management tools. Includes skill verification through peer reviews, milestone-based payments, and dispute resolution system. Implements reputation portability across platforms.

title: AI Plant Disease Detector & Treatment Platform
shortDescription: Computer vision platform that identifies plant diseases from photos and provides treatment recommendations
fullDescription: Develop a platform that helps farmers and gardeners identify plant diseases instantly through photos. Uses deep learning models trained on millions of plant images to detect diseases with high accuracy. Provides immediate treatment recommendations, preventive measures, and connects users with agricultural experts. Includes crop-specific calendars, weather-based risk alerts, and community knowledge sharing.

title: Remote Team Health & Wellness Monitor
shortDescription: Privacy-first platform monitoring remote team well-being and preventing burnout
fullDescription: Build an ethical platform that helps organizations monitor and improve remote team well-being without invasive surveillance. Uses anonymized metadata analysis, voluntary check-ins, and AI-powered burnout prediction. Features team sentiment analysis, workload balancing recommendations, and anonymous feedback system. Includes wellness challenges, virtual coffee breaks, and integration with HR systems.

title: Local Food Surplus Marketplace
shortDescription: Platform connecting restaurants and grocery stores with consumers for discounted surplus food
fullDescription: Create a marketplace that reduces food waste by enabling restaurants, cafes, and grocery stores to sell surplus food at discounted prices to local consumers. Features real-time inventory updates, dynamic pricing based on time-to-expiry, and gamified sustainability tracking. Includes subscription-based surprise bags, donation integration with food banks, and carbon footprint savings calculator.

title: Immersive History Education Platform
shortDescription: Interactive 3D historical events explorer for immersive learning
fullDescription: Build an educational platform that brings history to life through interactive 3D reconstructions of historical events and locations. Features timeline-based navigation, 3D models of historical artifacts, and narrative-driven learning paths. Implements gamified quizzes, primary source document integration, and collaborative classroom features. Includes VR mode for immersive experiences and accessibility features for diverse learners.

title: AI-Powered Pet Health Tracker
shortDescription: Comprehensive pet health monitoring platform with symptom checker and vet telemedicine
fullDescription: Create a holistic pet health platform that helps owners track their pets' health, detect early symptoms, and connect with veterinarians. Features AI symptom checker trained on veterinary data, medication reminders, and growth tracking. Includes pet passport for travel, lost pet alert system, and integration with pet wearables. Provides personalized nutrition and exercise recommendations based on breed, age, and health conditions.

title: Indigenous Language Preservation Platform
shortDescription: Digital platform for documenting, teaching, and preserving endangered indigenous languages
fullDescription: Build a culturally-sensitive platform dedicated to preserving endangered indigenous languages through community collaboration. Features audio/video recording of native speakers, interactive language lessons, and digital storytelling. Implements speech recognition for pronunciation feedback, dictionary building tools, and orthography development. Includes cultural context documentation, oral history preservation, and offline access for remote communities.

title: Micro-Mobility Fleet Management
shortDescription: Platform for managing shared e-scooters, e-bikes, and e-mopeds
fullDescription: Develop a comprehensive fleet management platform for micro-mobility operators. Features real-time vehicle tracking, predictive maintenance, battery swapping logistics, and dynamic pricing. Implements geofencing for speed limits and no-parking zones, rider behavior monitoring, and automated rebalancing recommendations. Includes rider app with trip planning, pricing estimation, and safety features.

title: Clinical Trial Matching Platform
shortDescription: AI platform matching patients with relevant clinical trials based on medical records
fullDescription: Build a platform that helps patients find appropriate clinical trials using AI analysis of medical records. Features automated eligibility screening, natural language processing of trial protocols, and patient-friendly trial explanations. Implements privacy-preserving matching, electronic health record integration, and site location optimization. Includes trial feasibility analytics for sponsors and researchers.

title: Zero Waste Lifestyle Platform
shortDescription: Gamified platform for individuals to track and reduce their waste footprint
fullDescription: Create a comprehensive platform that helps individuals adopt zero-waste lifestyles through tracking, education, and community support. Features waste diary with barcode scanning for product packaging analysis, personalized reduction challenges, and local zero-waste store locator. Implements carbon footprint calculation, recycling education, and upcycling project tutorials. Includes social features for sharing achievements and community challenges.

title: AI Thesis & Research Advisor
shortDescription: Intelligent platform helping students find research topics and write academic papers
fullDescription: Build an AI-powered platform that assists students throughout their thesis journey. Features research gap identification through literature analysis, personalized topic recommendations, and automated literature review generation. Implements citation analysis, methodology suggestions, and writing assistance with academic style checking. Includes plagiarism detection, reference management, and supervisor collaboration tools.

title: Community Fridge Network
shortDescription: Platform connecting community fridges with donors and volunteers
fullDescription: Develop a platform that supports community fridge networks - publicly accessible refrigerators where people can donate or take free food. Features real-time fridge inventory tracking, donation scheduling, and volunteer coordination. Implements food safety monitoring with temperature sensors, expiry date tracking, and community impact metrics. Includes mobile app for quick updates and SMS notifications for urgent needs.

title: Digital Heritage Preservation Platform
shortDescription: 3D digitization platform for preserving cultural heritage sites
fullDescription: Build a platform for digitizing and preserving cultural heritage sites using photogrammetry and 3D reconstruction. Enables users to upload photos of heritage sites and automatically generates 3D models. Features damage assessment tools, restoration planning, and virtual tourism experiences. Implements time-lapse reconstruction for monitoring deterioration over time.

title: Smart Parking Ecosystem
shortDescription: IoT-powered platform for finding, reserving, and sharing parking spaces
fullDescription: Create a comprehensive smart parking platform that helps drivers find available parking in real-time. Features IoT sensor integration for occupancy detection, reservation system with dynamic pricing, and peer-to-peer parking space sharing. Implements license plate recognition, EV charging station integration, and automated payment. Includes parking analytics for city planners and businesses.

title: Therapeutic Art & Expression Platform
shortDescription: Digital art therapy platform for mental health and emotional expression
fullDescription: Build a compassionate platform that uses art creation as a tool for mental health and emotional expression. Features guided art therapy exercises, emotion-based color recommendations, and anonymous art sharing community. Implements AI-powered art analysis to detect emotional patterns, mood tracking through artwork, and integration with professional art therapists. Includes journaling features and therapeutic art challenges.

title: Circular Electronics Marketplace
shortDescription: Platform for refurbished, repaired, and recycled electronics with transparency
fullDescription: Create a marketplace dedicated to extending the life of electronics through refurbishment, repair, and recycling. Features detailed refurbishment grading, diagnostic test results transparency, and repair history tracking. Implements AI-powered price estimation, component-level inventory, and trade-in programs. Includes DIY repair guides, certified refurbisher network, and e-waste recycling locator.

title: Multimodal Urban Transport Planner
shortDescription: AI-powered journey planner combining public transit, micromobility, and ride-sharing
fullDescription: Build an intelligent urban mobility platform that plans optimal journeys combining multiple transport modes. Features real-time integration with public transit, bike-sharing, e-scooters, ride-hailing, and walking. Implements personalized preference learning, carbon footprint optimization, and accessibility-first routing. Includes MaaS subscription management, multimodal tickets, and delay compensation automation.

title: AI Music Therapy Platform
shortDescription: Personalized music therapy for cognitive health and rehabilitation
fullDescription: Develop a platform that uses AI to generate personalized therapeutic music for cognitive rehabilitation, dementia care, and mental wellness. Features real-time music generation based on biometric feedback, reminiscence therapy through personalized playlists, and cognitive exercise through interactive music games. Implements EEG integration for neurofeedback, emotion recognition from facial expressions, and progress tracking for therapists.

title: Subsidized Housing Marketplace
shortDescription: Platform connecting low-income families with available subsidized housing
fullDescription: Build a platform that addresses the affordable housing crisis by aggregating subsidized housing listings and simplifying the application process. Features real-time vacancy tracking, eligibility screening, and document management. Implements landlord incentives visualization, community resources mapping, and lease literacy tools. Includes multilingual support, accessibility filters, and application status tracking.

title: Skills-Based Volunteer Matching
shortDescription: Platform matching professionals with nonprofits based on specific skills
fullDescription: Create a platform that connects skilled professionals with nonprofits needing specific expertise beyond general volunteering. Features skills inventory system, project-based matching, and virtual volunteering tools. Implements impact tracking, micro-volunteering opportunities, and corporate partnership integration. Includes skills assessment, time banking, and professional development recognition.

title: Urban Farming Management Platform
shortDescription: Comprehensive platform for managing urban farms, community gardens, and hydroponic systems
fullDescription: Build a platform that helps urban farmers and community gardeners manage their growing operations. Features crop planning based on local climate data, automated irrigation scheduling, and pest/disease identification. Implements yield forecasting, resource optimization, and harvest distribution coordination. Includes community garden plot management, tool library, and educational resources.

title: Neurodiverse Workplace Accommodation Platform
shortDescription: Digital workplace tools designed specifically for neurodiverse employees
fullDescription: Create a platform that helps organizations create more inclusive workplaces for neurodiverse employees. Features customizable interfaces for sensory sensitivities, executive function support tools, and clear communication templates. Implements distraction-free writing environments, visual task management, and social story generators for workplace interactions. Includes employer education resources and anonymous accommodation requests.

timeline.title: Task Management
timeline.description: Visual kanban with executive function support

title: Digital Bank for Immigrants & Refugees
shortDescription: Inclusive financial platform designed specifically for immigrants, refugees, and undocumented individuals
fullDescription: Build a digital banking platform that addresses the unique financial challenges faced by immigrants and refugees. Features international money transfers with better rates than traditional remittance, alternative identity verification without government ID, and credit building through rent and bill payments. Implements multilingual support, financial literacy tools tailored to different countries of origin, and integration with immigration legal services. Includes family remittance tracking, currency exchange optimization, and cross-border credit history portability.
architecture: Next.js frontend with server components, React Native mobile apps, NestJS microservices, PostgreSQL for core banking data, Stellar blockchain for cross-border payments, alternative ID verification system with document OCR and biometric matching, multi-language content delivery network

title: Wildfire Evacuation & Resilience Platform
shortDescription: AI-powered platform for wildfire evacuation planning and community resilience
fullDescription: Create a comprehensive platform that helps communities prepare for, respond to, and recover from wildfires. Features real-time fire perimeter tracking from satellite data, personalized evacuation route planning, and community vulnerability mapping. Implements AI-powered fire spread prediction, home hardening recommendations, and critical infrastructure protection planning. Includes pet and livestock evacuation coordination, medication portability, and post-fire recovery resource matching.
architecture: Next.js PWA with offline-first capabilities, React Native mobile apps, Python FastAPI for ML services, PostGIS for geospatial queries, satellite data ingestion pipeline, real-time fire perimeter updates, cellular/Starlink hybrid connectivity

title: Elderly Digital Literacy Academy
shortDescription: Patient, accessible platform teaching digital skills to seniors
fullDescription: Build a compassionate platform designed specifically to teach digital literacy to elderly users. Features voice-controlled navigation, large-print interfaces, and step-by-step video tutorials with family members as co-teachers. Implements progress tracking with positive reinforcement, live remote assistance with screen sharing, and simplified explanations of complex concepts. Includes scam detection training, digital safety lessons, and intergenerational learning where grandchildren can become certified coaches for grandparents.
architecture: React frontend with voice-first navigation, Node.js backend, WCAG AAA compliant design, WebRTC for remote assistance, gamification engine, family coaching certification system

title: Autonomous Farm Robotics Control Platform
shortDescription: Cloud platform for monitoring and controlling autonomous agricultural robots
fullDescription: Develop a platform that enables farmers to deploy, monitor, and control fleets of autonomous agricultural robots. Features robot task scheduling, real-time telemetry visualization, and multi-robot coordination algorithms. Implements computer vision for crop health assessment, precision spraying control, and autonomous navigation planning. Includes fleet management dashboards, predictive maintenance, and integration with farm management software.
architecture: React frontend with 3D visualization, Python FastAPI backend, ROS2 bridge for robot control, TimescaleDB for telemetry, PostGIS for field mapping, real-time WebSocket communication, Gazebo simulation integration

title: Nonpartisan Voting Education & Engagement Platform
shortDescription: Comprehensive platform for voter education, registration, and civic engagement
fullDescription: Build a nonpartisan platform that demystifies the voting process and increases civic participation. Features personalized ballot information based on address, candidate comparison tools, and plain-language explanations of ballot measures. Implements voter registration assistance with ID requirement guidance, polling place locator with wait times, and election reminder system. Includes vote-by-mail tracking, accessibility information for voters with disabilities, and post-election engagement opportunities.
architecture: Next.js frontend with server-side rendering for SEO, React Native mobile apps, PostGIS for precinct mapping, multi-source civic data aggregation, nonpartisan content moderation system, accessibility-first design

timeline.title: Civic Data Integration
timeline.description: Google Civic API and precinct mapping

title: Emotional Support Animal Verification Platform
shortDescription: Legitimate platform for emotional support animal verification and housing accommodation
fullDescription: Create a platform that provides legitimate, ethical verification for emotional support animals while combating fraudulent certifications. Features licensed therapist network for legitimate evaluations, digital ESA letters with QR verification, and housing accommodation request automation. Implements landlord education portal, airline policy integration, and public access behavior training. Includes animal health record management and reasonable accommodation tracking.
architecture: Next.js frontend, NestJS backend, therapist telehealth platform, QR-based verification system, HIPAA-compliant data storage, landlord and airline policy database

title: Indigenous Art Authentication & Marketplace
shortDescription: Blockchain-based platform for authenticating and ethically trading indigenous art
fullDescription: Build a platform that protects indigenous artists from cultural appropriation and forgery while creating sustainable economic opportunities. Features artist verification through tribal affiliation, blockchain provenance tracking, and digital certificates of authenticity. Implements cultural knowledge licensing, appropriate use guidelines, and revenue sharing with indigenous communities. Includes virtual galleries, art repatriation assistance, and educational resources about cultural significance.
architecture: Next.js frontend with 3D art viewing, Ethereum smart contracts for provenance, IPFS for decentralized storage, tribal council verification workflow, cultural knowledge licensing system, virtual gallery spaces

title: Rare Disease Community & Research Platform
shortDescription: Social and research platform connecting patients with rare diseases and researchers
fullDescription: Create a compassionate platform that connects patients with rare diseases, facilitates data sharing for research, and accelerates diagnosis. Features patient-matched social networking, symptom tracker with privacy controls, and secure medical data donation for research. Implements AI-powered diagnostic assistance for undiagnosed patients, clinical trial matching, and patient-reported outcome measures. Includes caregiver support networks, multilingual resources, and telemedicine with specialists.
architecture: React frontend, Python FastAPI backend, Neo4j for patient-disease relationship mapping, FHIR-compliant medical data exchange, privacy-preserving data donation pipeline, phenotype matching algorithm for undiagnosed patients

title: Community Flood Resilience Hub
shortDescription: Platform for flood prediction, preparation, and community response coordination
fullDescription: Build a comprehensive platform that helps communities prepare for and respond to flooding events. Features real-time river gauge monitoring, AI-powered flood inundation forecasting, and property-level flood risk assessment. Implements community sandbag coordination, evacuation route planning, and post-flood recovery resource matching. Includes flood-resistant building techniques, insurance claim assistance, and long-term resilience planning.
architecture: Next.js PWA with offline-first capabilities, React Native mobile apps, Python FastAPI for ML services, PostGIS for floodplain mapping, real-time hydrological data ingestion, LSTM-based flood forecasting, community resource coordination

title: Microbiome-Based Personalized Nutrition
shortDescription: Platform providing personalized nutrition recommendations based on gut microbiome analysis
fullDescription: Develop a platform that translates complex gut microbiome test results into personalized, actionable nutrition recommendations. Features secure upload and analysis of 16S rRNA sequencing data, AI-powered food-microbiome interaction predictions, and personalized meal planning. Implements symptom-food diary correlation, supplement recommendations, and integration with continuous glucose monitors. Includes grocery list generation, recipe customization, and progress tracking through follow-up testing.
architecture: Next.js frontend, Python FastAPI for bioinformatics processing, PostgreSQL for user data, machine learning pipeline for microbiome-food interactions, USDA food database integration, CGM API connectivity

title: Community-Owned Renewable Energy Platform
shortDescription: Platform enabling communities to collectively own and manage renewable energy projects
fullDescription: Build a platform that democratizes renewable energy by enabling communities to collectively own solar, wind, and micro-hydro projects. Features project feasibility assessment, cooperative governance tools, and automated dividend distribution. Implements crowdfunding for project capital, energy production monitoring, and virtual power plant aggregation. Includes carbon credit tracking, community battery sharing, and energy efficiency coaching.
architecture: Next.js frontend, Node.js backend, Ethereum DAO smart contracts for cooperative governance, TimescaleDB for energy monitoring, solar irradiance API integration, community investment platform

title: Dyslexia-Friendly Learning Platform
shortDescription: Specialized educational platform designed for students with dyslexia
fullDescription: Create a comprehensive learning platform specifically designed for students with dyslexia. Features OpenDyslexic font integration, custom color overlays, and text-to-speech with synchronized highlighting. Implements multisensory spelling exercises, phonics-based reading instruction, and assistive writing tools with predictive text. Includes educator resources, IEP goal tracking, and home-school communication tools.
architecture: React frontend with dyslexia-optimized rendering, Node.js backend, Web Speech API for text-to-speech, TensorFlow.js for predictive typing, accessibility-first component library, IEP goal tracking system

title: Public Defender Case Management System
shortDescription: Open-source case management platform for under-resourced public defender offices
fullDescription: Build a free, open-source case management system specifically designed for public defender offices with limited resources. Features client intake automation, deadline tracking with ethical obligation alerts, and collaborative case strategy tools. Implements evidence management with chain-of-custody tracking, sentencing calculator, and immigration consequence assessment. Includes client communication portal, interpreter scheduling, and pro bono attorney coordination.
architecture: React frontend, Node.js backend, PostgreSQL for case data, end-to-end encryption for client communications, automated deadline calculation, evidence chain-of-custody tracking, open-source licensing

title: Blind-Accessible Gaming Platform
shortDescription: Audio-based gaming platform designed for blind and low-vision players
fullDescription: Create a gaming platform that makes video games accessible to blind and low-vision players through audio-based mechanics. Features 3D spatial audio for navigation, audio cues for game states, and voice-controlled interactions. Implements accessible versions of classic games, original audio-only games, and multiplayer with sighted players. Includes haptic feedback integration, screen reader compatibility, and community level sharing.
architecture: React frontend, Web Audio API with Resonance Audio for 3D spatial sound, Three.js for optional visual elements, voice recognition for controls, haptic feedback for mobile devices, multiplayer synchronization

title: Human Trafficking Identification & Reporting
shortDescription: Training platform for hospitality workers to identify and report human trafficking
fullDescription: Build a training and reporting platform that empowers hospitality workers to identify and respond to human trafficking indicators. Features interactive scenario-based training, red flag identification guides, and confidential reporting tools. Implements chain-wide alert systems, survivor resource directories, and law enforcement coordination protocols. Includes multi-language support, certification tracking, and anonymized data sharing for prevention research.
architecture: Next.js frontend, Node.js backend, encrypted anonymous reporting system, interactive training modules, certification tracking, multi-language support, law enforcement API integration

title: Intergenerational Story Sharing Platform
shortDescription: Platform connecting seniors with youth for oral history preservation and mentorship
fullDescription: Create a heartwarming platform that connects seniors with young people for oral history preservation, skill sharing, and intergenerational mentorship. Features structured interview guides, video/audio recording tools, and digital storybook creation. Implements life timeline visualization, wisdom categorization, and family tree integration. Includes classroom connections for history projects, dementia-friendly interfaces, and legacy letter writing.
architecture: Next.js frontend with senior-friendly accessibility, Node.js backend, WebRTC for video interviews, FFmpeg.wasm for media processing, timeline visualization, classroom connection portal

title: Crisis Nursery Network Platform
shortDescription: Platform connecting families in crisis with emergency childcare services
fullDescription: Build a platform that supports crisis nurseries - emergency childcare services for families experiencing stress, homelessness, or medical emergencies. Features real-time bed availability, emergency intake coordination, and family resource matching. Implements trauma-informed care protocols, sibling group accommodation, and transportation coordination. Includes parent support groups, follow-up case management, and prevention resource referrals.
architecture: Next.js frontend, NestJS backend, real-time bed availability tracking, emergency intake workflow, trauma-informed data design, transportation coordination, case management system

title: Digital Equal Access to Justice Platform
shortDescription: Simplifying legal processes for self-represented litigants in civil court
fullDescription: Create a platform that makes civil court processes accessible to self-represented litigants who cannot afford attorneys. Features plain language explanations of legal procedures, guided document assembly for court forms, and deadline calculator. Implements court navigation tools, evidence organization templates, and virtual court preparation. Includes legal glossary, community legal education, and pro bono attorney matching for limited scope representation.
architecture: Next.js frontend with plain language UX, Node.js backend, Docassemble integration for court forms, deadline calculation engine, AI-powered legal text simplification, pro bono attorney matching

title: Assistive Technology Marketplace
shortDescription: Marketplace for used assistive technology devices and equipment
fullDescription: Build a platform for buying, selling, and donating used assistive technology devices - wheelchairs, hearing aids, communication devices, and adaptive equipment. Features device compatibility matching, condition verification, and insurance reimbursement assistance. Implements equipment loan programs, repair services directory, and accessibility feature comparison. Includes virtual equipment demonstrations, funding assistance, and community equipment lending libraries.
architecture: Next.js frontend, NestJS backend, PostgreSQL for equipment inventory, PostGIS for loan library locations, Algolia for assistive tech search, Stripe Connect for marketplace payments, WebRTC for virtual demonstrations

title: Homeless Shelter Coordination Platform
shortDescription: Real-time shelter bed availability and intake coordination system
fullDescription: Develop a platform that coordinates homeless shelter capacity across a city region in real-time. Features live bed availability tracking, centralized intake assessment, and transportation matching. Implements shelter diversion resources, housing-first placement coordination, and service provider collaboration. Includes client choice preferences, pet-friendly shelter identification, and chronic homelessness prioritization algorithms.
architecture: Next.js frontend, NestJS backend, real-time bed tracking across multiple shelters, PostGIS for service locations, centralized intake assessment, housing-first prioritization algorithm, client privacy protection

title: Prisoner Reentry Success Hub
shortDescription: Comprehensive platform supporting formerly incarcerated individuals in successful community reintegration
fullDescription: Build a holistic platform that supports individuals reentering society after incarceration. Features employment matching with fair-chance employers, expungement eligibility assessment, and identification document replacement assistance. Implements housing locator for second-chance rentals, mental health service coordination, and peer mentorship matching. Includes benefits eligibility screening, digital skills training, and family reunification resources.
architecture: Next.js frontend, Node.js backend, fair-chance employer database, expungement eligibility algorithm, ID replacement workflow, second-chance housing locator, peer mentorship matching

title: Coral Reef Restoration Platform
shortDescription: Platform for coordinating coral reef restoration and citizen science monitoring
fullDescription: Create a platform that supports global coral reef restoration efforts through citizen science, data collection, and restoration coordination. Features underwater image analysis for coral health assessment, dive site mapping, and restoration progress tracking. Implements coral nursery management, outplanting coordination, and bleaching alert system. Includes volunteer training certification, research data sharing, and restoration impact visualization.
architecture: Next.js frontend, Python FastAPI backend, PyTorch for coral health classification, PostGIS for reef mapping, offline-first mobile app for dive data collection, 3D reef reconstruction from photos

title: Indigenous Food Sovereignty Network
shortDescription: Platform supporting indigenous communities in reclaiming traditional food systems
fullDescription: Build a culturally-grounded platform that supports indigenous communities in revitalizing traditional food systems and achieving food sovereignty. Features traditional food mapping, seed saving networks, and indigenous food forest planning. Implements seasonal harvesting calendars, traditional recipe preservation, and intergenerational knowledge transfer. Includes tribal food policy advocacy, native plant nursery coordination, and youth mentorship programs.
architecture: Next.js frontend with indigenous language support, Node.js backend, PostGIS for traditional food mapping, community-governed data sharing, offline-first for remote communities, multimedia knowledge preservation

title: Disaster Volunteer Coordination Platform
shortDescription: Platform for matching spontaneous volunteers with disaster response needs
fullDescription: Create a platform that coordinates spontaneous volunteers during natural disasters, matching available skills with immediate community needs. Features skills-based volunteer intake, real-time task assignment, and just-in-time training. Implements credential verification, liability management, and volunteer check-in/check-out. Includes shelter support coordination, debris removal tasking, and feeding operation scheduling. Provides post-disaster volunteer recognition and impact reporting.
architecture: Next.js PWA with offline-first capabilities, React Native mobile app for field volunteers, Node.js backend, PostGIS for disaster zone mapping, real-time task assignment, credential verification system

title: Rural Telemedicine Hub
shortDescription: Comprehensive telemedicine platform designed for low-bandwidth rural communities
fullDescription: Build a telemedicine platform specifically optimized for rural and remote communities with limited internet connectivity. Features asynchronous store-and-forward consultations, low-bandwidth video compression, and SMS-based appointment reminders. Implements offline-capable electronic health records, medication delivery coordination, and mobile diagnostic device integration. Includes community health worker tools, multi-language support, and emergency evacuation coordination.
architecture: React PWA with offline-first capabilities, React Native mobile apps, CouchDB/PouchDB for offline sync, optimized video compression for low bandwidth, FHIR-compliant health records, SMS-based workflows

title: Community-Based Sustainable Forestry Platform
shortDescription: Platform supporting indigenous and local communities in sustainable forest management
fullDescription: Develop a platform that empowers indigenous and local communities to manage forests sustainably, participate in carbon markets, and prevent deforestation. Features forest carbon inventory and monitoring, community-based land use planning, and sustainable harvest tracking. Implements REDD+ project development, non-timber forest product marketing, and illegal logging alert system. Includes traditional ecological knowledge integration, community land mapping, and fair-trade certification.
architecture: Next.js frontend, Python FastAPI backend, Sentinel Hub for forest monitoring, PyTorch for deforestation detection, PostGIS for community land mapping, blockchain for carbon credit trading, offline-first mobile for remote forest patrols

title: Deaf-Accessible Education Platform
shortDescription: Educational platform designed for deaf and hard-of-hearing students with sign language integration
fullDescription: Create a comprehensive educational platform designed specifically for deaf and hard-of-hearing students. Features integrated sign language video for all content, visual learning materials, and speech-to-text with sign language avatar. Implements bilingual education (national sign language + written language), visual phonetics, and deaf culture curriculum. Includes family sign language training, interpreter coordination, and hearing aid/cochlear implant device connectivity.
architecture: React frontend with visual-first design, Node.js backend, integrated sign language video player, speech-to-text with visual highlighting, sign language avatar for text-to-sign, deaf educator co-design process

title: Community Composting Network Platform
shortDescription: Platform connecting households, community gardens, and farms for local composting
fullDescription: Build a platform that facilitates community-scale composting by connecting households with food waste to local composters, community gardens, and urban farms. Features waste drop-off coordination, compost quality monitoring, and soil health tracking. Implements composting education, bin building workshops, and odor/vector management protocols. Includes community garden soil testing, vermicomposting starter kits, and municipal composting partnership integration.

fullDescription: Create a comprehensive platform that helps families with disabled children find truly accessible playgrounds. Implements wheelchair-accessible swing locator, communication board identification, and quiet space mapping. Includes bathroom accessibility, parking proximity, and shade coverage information. title: Adaptive Sports Equipment Library
shortDescription: Platform for sharing and borrowing adaptive sports equipment
fullDescription: Build a platform that enables adaptive sports equipment libraries - lending programs for specialized sports equipment for people with disabilities. Features equipment inventory management, reservation scheduling, and condition tracking. Implements equipment matching based on disability type and sport interest, maintenance tracking, and shipping coordination. title: Child Nutrition & Cooking Education Platform
shortDescription: Interactive platform teaching children about nutrition and cooking skills
fullDescription: Create a engaging, child-friendly platform that teaches nutrition education and basic cooking skills to elementary-age children. Features interactive food groups exploration, visual recipe guides with step-by-step photos, and kitchen safety games. Implements picky eater support strategies, cultural food celebration, and family cooking challenges. Includes school garden connections, farmer profiles, and food waste awareness activities.

title: Indigenous Language Immersion School
shortDescription: Virtual immersion platform for endangered indigenous language learning
fullDescription: Build a virtual language immersion platform specifically for endangered indigenous languages. Features immersion-based learning with minimal English, native speaker video content, and interactive speaking practice. Implements total physical response activities, storytelling methodology, and community-driven content creation. Includes elder knowledge preservation, language proficiency assessment, and immersion teacher training. Provides cultural context integration and ceremonial vocabulary with appropriate protocols.
architecture: Next.js frontend with immersion-first design, Node.js backend, custom automatic speech recognition for endangered languages, interactive video lessons, community content governance, offline-capable for remote communities

title: Community-Led Digital Archiving Platform
shortDescription: Platform empowering communities to create and manage their own digital archives
fullDescription: Create a platform that enables communities to build, manage, and share their own digital archives without technical expertise. Features intuitive collection building, metadata creation, and multimedia preservation. Implements community governance protocols, cultural access restrictions, and collaborative description. Includes oral history workflows, digitization guidance, and integration with major archives. Provides permanent storage with redundancy and community-controlled access permissions.
architecture: Next.js frontend, Node.js backend, IPFS/Filecoin for permanent distributed storage, IIIF for image viewing, Dublin Core metadata, community governance workflow, access control protocols

title: Accessible Museum Experience Platform
shortDescription: Digital platform making museum exhibitions accessible to visitors with disabilities
fullDescription: Build a platform that makes museum exhibitions fully accessible to visitors with diverse disabilities. Features virtual accessible tours, multi-sensory description guides, and sign language interpretation videos. Implements cognitive accessibility with simplified text, sensory-friendly visit planning, and tactile replica coordination. Includes wheelchair navigation planning, audio induction loop locator, and quiet hours scheduling. Provides pre-visit preparation materials and post-visit engagement activities.
architecture: Next.js frontend, Node.js backend, Three.js virtual tours, PostGIS for museum navigation, multi-sensory content delivery, sign language integration, cognitive accessibility tools

title: Community Recycling Education Platform
shortDescription: Interactive platform teaching proper recycling practices through gamification
fullDescription: Create a engaging platform that educates communities about proper recycling practices through gamified learning. Features waste sorting games, recycling bin locator, and personalized recycling guides based on local municipal rules. Implements contamination reduction challenges, recycling facility virtual tours, and product lifecycle education. Includes community recycling competitions, reward programs with local business partnerships, and household recycling tracking.
architecture: Next.js frontend, Node.js backend, PostGIS for recycling center mapping, gamification engine, waste sorting games, local recycling rule database, community challenge system

title: Accessible Voting Information Guide
shortDescription: Comprehensive voting accessibility platform for voters with disabilities
fullDescription: Build a comprehensive platform that ensures voters with disabilities can exercise their right to vote independently and privately. Features polling place accessibility assessments, accessible voting machine locator, and curbside voting availability. Implements transportation coordination for voters with disabilities, alternative ballot delivery options, and assistance animal policies. Includes plain language ballot explanation, candidate accessibility records, and voter rights education. Provides toolkits for disability advocates and election official training.
architecture: Next.js frontend with screen reader optimization, Node.js backend, PostGIS for accessible polling place mapping, crowdsourced accessibility reviews, transportation coordination, plain language content

title: Community-Led Energy Audit Platform
shortDescription: Platform enabling communities to conduct DIY energy audits and access efficiency incentives
fullDescription: Create a platform that empowers communities to conduct their own energy audits, identify efficiency opportunities, and access incentive programs. Features guided virtual home assessments, thermal imaging analysis, and personalized efficiency recommendations. Implements DIY audit toolkits, contractor verification, and group purchasing coordination. Includes low-income assistance program screening, landlord-tenant efficiency tools, and community solar subscription management.
architecture: Next.js frontend, Node.js backend, TensorFlow.js for thermal image analysis, DSIRE API for incentive data, ROI calculator, group purchasing coordination, community solar management

title: Refugee Skills & Employment Matching Platform
shortDescription: Platform matching refugees' skills and credentials with employment opportunities
fullDescription: Build a comprehensive platform that helps refugees translate their skills, credentials, and experience into local employment opportunities. Features skills translation engine, credential evaluation assistance, and occupation matching. Implements international qualification recognition guidance, language skill assessment, and mentorship matching with diaspora professionals. Includes employer education on refugee talent, inclusive workplace certification, and entrepreneurship support for refugee-owned businesses.
architecture: Next.js frontend with 20+ language support, Node.js backend, NLP skills translation engine, credential evaluation database, occupation matching algorithm, diaspora mentorship network

title: Urban Heat Island Mitigation Platform
shortDescription: Platform helping communities identify and address urban heat islands
fullDescription: Develop a platform that helps communities identify urban heat islands and implement cooling solutions. Features satellite-based surface temperature mapping, community science heat sensors, and vulnerability analysis. Implements tree planting prioritization, cool roof incentive coordination, and shade infrastructure planning. Includes heat emergency response coordination, cooling center locator, and long-term climate adaptation planning.
architecture: Next.js frontend, Python FastAPI backend, satellite thermal data processing, community sensor network, heat vulnerability mapping, tree planting prioritization, emergency response coordination

title: Inclusive Higher Education Platform
shortDescription: Platform supporting students with intellectual disabilities in inclusive higher education
fullDescription: Create a platform that supports students with intellectual disabilities participating in inclusive post-secondary education programs. Features universal design for learning course materials, visual schedules, and peer mentor coordination. Implements executive function supports, self-advocacy skill building, and employment preparation. Includes family engagement portal, professor accessibility training, and inclusive social opportunities. Provides progress tracking toward individualized education goals.
architecture: React frontend with UDL principles, Node.js backend, visual scheduling system, peer mentor matching, professor training modules, individualized goal tracking

title: Community Land Trust Platform
shortDescription: Platform supporting community land trusts for permanently affordable housing
fullDescription: Build a platform that supports community land trusts - nonprofit organizations that acquire land to maintain permanently affordable housing. Features land acquisition pipeline management, ground lease administration, and resale formula calculation. Implements community governance tools, stewardship fee collection, and capital improvements tracking. Includes CLT formation resources, technical assistance for new trusts, and public land acquisition advocacy tools.
architecture: Next.js frontend, Node.js backend, PostGIS for land parcel mapping, ground lease document automation, resale formula calculator, community board governance tools, affordability tracking
